metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9638 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description:
oggenc in vorbis-tools 1.4.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (divide-by-zero error and crash) via a WAV file with the number ofchannels set to zero.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9638` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vorbis-tools - 1.4.0-7ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vorbis-tools package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-7ubuntu1').
